medium: Black chalk (recto); black chalk, with touches of pen and brown ink (verso)
title: Study of a Female Figure Reclining (Allegory of Fame Vanquished by Time), Architectural Studies (recto); Three Studies of a Female Figure Reclining, Studies of a Casket (verso)
